full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSR SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNYIGS MA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA` MI DANG MI MIN GYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA, RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG` KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG DUS DANG SHIN TU MTHO ZHING PHUN GSUM TSOGS PA DANG, DAM TSIG GTZAM @007A *, ,DANG RNAL 'BYOR YANGS PA THU SHE YE GUNG THUN TE MING TU RUS CHE RIN CHEN RDO RJE DON , ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO BA LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
